name: places/ChIJz4BF4qVZwokRHcqFatsJDUs
formattedAddress: 265 W 37th St #11E, New York, NY 10018, USA
adrFormatAddress: 265 W 37th St #11E, New York, NY 10018, USA

originalText.text: Cannot recommend this team highly enough! I got custom gloves made for a special event — they look INCREDIBLE and the process was a breeze! The glovemakers are absolute experts, with ideas and suggestions of styles that I’d never heard of that resulted in a look even better than I had imagined. Plus, the total cost came in at less than the estimate — when does THAT ever happen?? If you’re considering a glove purchase (either standard or custom), I’d highly encourage you to give them a call to discuss your needs and options.

originalText.text:
Rented a pair for a shoot and like them so much we wanted to keep them. But we were super disappointed to find out that the rental fee would not be credited towards the purchase of the gloves and they would cost full price on top of the (already hefty) rental fee. I'd love to have supported them more but this kind of dampens my enthusiasm. :(
Other than that, this place is truly one of a kind and is a holdout of old NYC in the age of Amazon. They have an incredible collection of every glove style under the sun and the craftsmanship is impeccable.

originalText.text:
My first visit by phone to Wing & Weft I met with Tamara and received the warmest and most cordial and intelligent answers to my meandering questions and an invitation to please come visit.  The next time I called I met with owner Katie Sue who was even more cordial and invited me to visit her location and ask more questions and  satisfy my needs.
THEN, when I went to the 11th floor at 265 W. 37th street  right off 8th Ave,  I was really impressed with the shop/store/facility and the comfort and warmth and classy rooms and activity, not to mention the bubbly and  classy owner Katie Sue.   She is the whole picture. & Patient and Helpful:)
I placed my order on the spot and walked out with a pair of gloves that couldn't have been more perfect for our production purposes.
Professional and fun was the experience and to see the facility and the array of stock on location, the quality and variety and the service, and knowledge, and assistance,  was extraordinary.
The price was beautiful and the options to purchase and / or rent merchandise for convenience was really so helpful.
Thanks to Tamara and Katie Sue -
Bruce Sanford Pub and Prod    We'll be back :)  Thanks So Much

originalText.text: Amazing custom gloves. Owner, Katie Sue is so knowledgable. Run, Dont walk!

text.text: Amazing custom gloves. Owner, Katie Sue is so knowledgable. Run, Dont walk!

originalText.text: LaCrasia is a legendary STAPLE of the New York Garment District.  I work in made-to-measure couture clothing, and we refer all of our clients to LaCrasia for their artisan crafted made to measure gloves that are head and shoulders above any other glove vendor in Manhattan.  I even have several pairs of my own, and I treasure them.  I never pass up an opportunity to refer friends and clients to them, and every referral has become a loyal customer and sincerely thanked me for introducing them.  Once you wear them, you'll be hooked :)
